text: The Congress of People's Deputies of the Russian SFSR () and since 1991 Congress of People's Deputies of the Russian Federation () was the main government legislature in the Russian SFSR and in the Russian Federation from 16 May 1990 to 21 September 1993. Members were elected on 4 March 1990 for a five-year term. It was dissolved on 4 October 1993. ==References== Category:Government of Russia
title: Congress of People's Deputies of Russia
